title: monotype, found in internet
author: martovitch

comments.content:
It looks like **[Orator](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112240/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=Orator%20Std%20-%20Medium&fid=1d6e07ebbc5886e714ee7de3b3b8164f&fsize=48&text=Threes%20and%20will%20Zamyn%20-%20uud%201921%205%3A30&wrap=2)** by John Scheppler [1962] available from Linotype, Adobe, Bitstream, + others  
(probably a bit emboldened at some points)
